body:
Comment 2 by **jz4082**: 
some more debugging info

user@host$ gotest -x -v
gotest 0.11s: gomake testpackage-clean
rm -f _test/main.a _gotest_.8
 [+23.32s]
gotest 23.43s: gomake testpackage GOTESTFILES=hello_test.go
8g  -o _gotest_.8 hello.go hello_test.go
rm -f _test/main.a
gopack grc _test/main.a _gotest_.8
 [+15.37s]
gotest 38.80s: gomake -s importpath
 [+15.00s]
gotest 53.92s: 8g -I _test _testmain.go
 [+0.54s]
gotest 54.45s: 8l -L _test _testmain.8
 [+2.18s]
gotest 56.63s: ./8.out -test.v=true
=== RUN  main.TestHello
--- PASS: main.TestHello (0.00 seconds)
	Starting Test
	Stopping Test
PASS
 [+1.04s]
gotest 57.70s: done
